You're totally awesome, K3!  Thanks very much for this.  For anyone who's never read Paolo, you're missing a brilliant writer on subjects that we're just beginning to need to know about.  Wonder what our food future might look like under Monsanto, Archer-Daniels-Midland and Cargill's corporate manipulations?  And I mean World-wide, not just in the US.  Read The Windup Girl.  SOON!
